```{r pkgs}
library(dplyr)
library(janeaustenr)
library(tidytext)
```


```{r}
austen <- austen_books()

austen
```


```{r}
# Unnest tokens the jane austen novels per word, and then count up
# the number of words per book

book_words <- austen %>%
  # unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text) %>%
  group_by(book) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)
```


# Use the tf idf to calculate the most important words in each book

```{r}
book_words
```
